question: In the given sequence of reactions, identify 'P', 'Q', 'R' and 'S' respectively.
images/a50b85a3-83d8-4fbb-91a0-e3776b92a4b2.png
choices: HBr, Alc. KOH, <katex>$NaNH_{2}$</katex>, Red hot iron tube
<katex>$Br_{2}$</katex>, Alc. KOH, <katex>$NaNH_{2}$</katex>, Red hot iron tube
explanation: The sequence is: Ethene <katex>$\xrightarrow{Br_2}$</katex> Vic-dibromide <katex>$\xrightarrow{Alc. KOH}$</katex> Vinyl bromide <katex>$\xrightarrow{NaNH_2}$</katex> Ethyne <katex>$\xrightarrow{\text{Red hot iron tube}}$</katex> Benzene.
